title: Warren Pledges to Keep Big Donors at Bay If She Wins Democratic Nomination
text:
Elizabeth Warren said her pledge not to woo wealthy donors to finance her presidential campaign would extend to the general election if she becomes the Democratic nominee, keeping the focus on grass-roots support.

As a presidential candidate, the Massachusetts senator hasn’t held fundraising events targeting supporters who contribute the legal maximum of $2,800 for the primary, relying instead on smaller donations raised online. She also hasn’t called or met privately with wealthy potential donors.

...
description: Elizabeth Warren said her pledge not to woo wealthy donors to finance her presidential campaign would extend to the general election if she becomes the Democratic nominee, keeping the focus on grass-roots support.
